content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: first saw these sitting on my back porch, which faces carrot island. three large red-orange orbs. the light seems to be pulsating from within. they were following the coastline in a v formation, very slowly, toward atlantic beach. i first thought they were helicopters, until the first one stopped and hovered then the other two followed suit and they stayed there for 2 or 3 minutes making no sound at all. i was close enough i would have heard some kind of noise. then one after the other they they took off straight up with lightening speed and disappeared. i first saw these glowing orbs in the fall of 2011. last sighting was jan, 2013. i have witnessed them, and there is always three, about eight times so far. sometimes they are moving in the opposite direction (from atantic beach towards harkers island). sometimes they shoot straight up, stop, zig zag, disappear, reappear then descend back to where they were all with lightening speed (definitely not a helicopter). i have never felt scared,i actually enjoy watching them. the pictures i have taken never turn out. just wondering if anyone else in this area has witnessed the same thing.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 large red-orange orbs following the coastline.

content.detailedDescription: So i was driving my car coming from grocery store when i spotted a bright glowing object to the southwest which i thought was a helicopter at first but realized it wasnt because 400 yards behind it came another orb same color bright orange im guessing they were 200 feet off the ground about 5 feet in diameter. i kept driving when i realized there was a third and by that time  i was starting to drive underneath their path the third was the last one and i slowed down and stuck my head out the window and when i did the last orb which was the only one i could still see kind of spun if that makes any since as it kept going on a northern path there was no noise this happened in columbia mo and i couldnt be the only one who saw these things i came home and told my wife about it and ive never been on this website before but you should post something if im not the only one who saw it
content.summary: Orbs spotted while driving home

content.detailedDescription:
On july 25, 2011 i was in swift forest camp, located in swift lake reservoir, skamania county in washington state. it was around 8:45 pm while i was sitting by the lake, the sun started to set.
i ran back to my campsite to retrieve my camera, then ran back to the lake shore, by the time i got the camera ready to photograph the sunset, i was only able to take one photo before the sun disappeared behind the mountains. 
the scenary was beautiful so i decided to take some photos.
the sky had turned fairly dark except in the lower part of the horizon where i could still see the fainting sun's glow and the outline of the mountains and trees. it was a clear night and there was nothing visible in the sky.

while viewing the photos , i noticed a bright object high above the mountains' outline, this object was not visible when i took the photos. 
i was puzzled so naturally, i decided to look closer and using a graphics program, i enlarged them to get a better look, i don't remember the last time my jaw dropped the way it did when i saw this object's shape, bright white, green bluish lights emanating and a series of dark spots forming a band from side to side, there is an orange-yellow glow in the lower side as if the sun was reflecting off some kind of metallic surface.
this thing seem to be invisible to the naked eye and only showed in the photos.
it does not look like any conventional aircraft i���m familiar with, what���s more, it appeared to be moving, judging by its position in relation to the mountains below it.
i've attached the three photographs to this e-mail.
content.summary: I saw this object's shape, bright white, green bluish lights emanating and a series of dark spots forming a band from side to side

content.detailedDescription: Looking out west window. from behind cloud, came flying towards my building direction, very low, continued over my building. wide and long to tips,chevron/boomerang shape. ghostly-transparent at first like a creature, no flapping of wings,then more mechanical/metallic as it flew past my window looking up. view was head on, underside possibly flaling material at the tail end, like kite material. whitish/gray color was more vibrant than adjacent city-reflecting clouds.In fear, i grabbed my holy bible next to alarm clock, and noted time of observation.
content.summary: Craft-like alive creature,change shape from creature to stealth bomber-like.

content.detailedDescription:
While sitting outside first noticed what i thought was a floating spider web or pollen moving slowly upward and to my right (i was facing se) object was,elongated, thin, white in color. object estimated at less then 1/2 inch (at longest) and less then 1.8 inch in width at arms length.
as object moved to my right it "dipped", then suddenly pointed up, and increased speed, then disappeared.
the weather was clear, sunny (sun higher and to left of object) and ground wind of less then 1 mile per hour (per weather instrument).
the "sighting" lasted less then three seconds.
with a minute after object dissapeared a military aircraft was seen flying se and another aircraft about a minute later in same direction.
the contrails of both craft disappeared within less then tow minutes.
i continued viewing area for the next hour with no activity seen.
content.summary: First thought "object" was floating spider web or pollen

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on i-40 and was watching the sky as i topped 9 mile hill. as i continued to drive the clould started becoming more defined. as i passed the old canyoncito exit i still could see the cloud and then the craft came out of the cloud. it was half the size of the smaller mesa  and lowered below the larger mesa. that is when i knew it was something more than the cloud. as it decended below the mesa it was slowly turning clock-wise, reminding of how an electric meter turns. i was afraid to stop and the weather was cold and windy that afternoon, and no other cars were stopping. i didn't think that i was "spiritualizing matter" because i never heard of a descripton like this, but i watched it for about 5 to 10 minutes. it was maybe a quarter mile in width,i don't know what the height could have been. there were no windows or lights, and i thought it might be a hologram since it was clouldy, but it was slowly moving and spinning.It was a dull gray that was the same color as the cloud before decending. it slowly moved between the mesa and at that time i was at the los lunas exit, after that i could not locate it in my rear view mirror. i think i called david jacobs phd, and or icar and left a voicemail. on monday my neighboor across the street came over and i told her about the ufo. she told me her relatives had stopped by on friday and they were upset after seeing something in the sky that looked like a merry go round on their way back from grants, nm to san fidel. the shape i saw was like a round layer cake in shape. during that next week there was unusual military activity, my landlord had seen some type of craft above the area hovering with a humming sound but the trees were not disturbed. he is a vetran and knows ths shapes and sounds of most military aircraft. we later called kirkland air force base and reported the low flying military craft and the two ufos. it was reported to base public affairs.I am not sure if this activity was due to local pueblo tribes conducting ceremonies.I was seeing orbs on and off for over a week that cause distress and panic. this object seemed to be very solid and i din't feel that goverment technology could produce something that masssive and dense. last visual i had it was traveling between the two mesa's.
content.summary: Large dull gray craft decended out of a storm cloud over los lunas, nm then headed se behind a mesa.  it wa to my left as i headed w on i-40.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were on our balcony around 945 pm on april 12 2013 located in west knoxville tn when i noticed a triangular object with the front edge dimly lit moving at an incredible rate of speed.  i pointed it out to my girlfriend and she saw it before it disappeared to the north.  the whole incident lasted maybe four seconds.  it made no sound and the whole craft seemed semicloaked.  the ligts on the leading edge of the craft looked like florescent tubes and were very dim. if there was a full moon i doubt i would have been able to see it.  it looked like it was moving as fast as a shooting star would.
content.summary: Extremely fast moving triangle with the leading edges dimly lit moving at a high rate of speed over knoxville.

content.detailedDescription:
We had a fire going in the back yard hanging out with several friends. around 9pm (around about). we hear a loud explosion like maybe a car accident. then we noticed the power went out in the neighborhood. we call the power company and they said there was reported 1100 outages already. we think--oh, a transformer blew maybe a car crashed into a pole or something. maybe that's what the noise was. no biggie--we've got a fire going, we're having fun. about 15 or so minutes pass and we see a quick streak across the sky then it stopped and moved steady across the sky. it was a reddish-orange color. no flashing, no crazy movement. just steady through the sky in a straight path. my first thought--oh, maybe it's a helicopter because of the loud crash we heard. but there was no spotlight coming from it and no noise. then we see another one. this one didn't move fist then slow down. it just moved slowly across the sky. our friends house that we were at is in a wooded area but off a main road through raleigh. when we first see the orange light it looks like it's just over the tree tops then went into the horizon. we saw a total of 6, one after another. between 2 and 5 minutes apart. 
another friend of ours shows up and he said that the main road is blocked off in several directions and the officer said that a tree fell and took out some powerlines. 
power was restored at 11:30

when my husband and i left there is an intersection if we turn right and all of it is blocked off. that intersection is directly behind the neighborhood we were in. we trun around and the next intersection down is also closed off. there is also a right trun between the 2 intersections and it was also closed off. if a tree fell why were there several areas blocked off? we had to take a back road to get to the main road we needed to take. also, if power was restored at 11:30pm and we left at 2:30am--why were they still blocked off in several directions and still working in the area. 

the whole experience was strange. 

in the video i took i asked "it would have a soptlight, right" i asked that becasue someone said it was probably a helicopter. 
the light looks like it's flashing but it's not. it's just goin behind trees. 

sorry it's shaky video--i was walking.
content.summary: Solid orange lights (6, one after another) moving steady across the sky.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Have witnessed multiple ufo's every night since february 16th,hundreds of pictures,videos,and dozens of witnesses now after showing people.Miltary planes,fighter jets,and helicopter flyovers regularly.
   although not the greatest i have videos of ufo's shooting a red beam onto neighbors houses and what i assume they are doing is abducting people late at night,have witnessed this strange behavior numerous times,at least three separate types of ufo's here = flying discs or saucers,triangles,and large cigar shaped.
   i watch ufo's come down from the sky at dusk and watch them move slowly about the area until daylight.Has my family on edge and concerned with all the activity so many,so often,will post some pics,videos are too time consuming to download.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Boomerang,   Cigar,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Teardrop,   Triangle
content.summary: Have witnessed multiple ufo's every night since mid-february,made 4 reports early on,have hundreds of videos and pictures,have witnessed three different types of ufo's,still ongoing.Have witnessed military planes and black helicopters,have some on digital

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i had been looking for the northern lights in our back yard  earlier in the evening and became restless because we didn't see anything. we just assumed it was because of light pollution from the surrounding area so we went inside to watch the capitals hockey game and kept checking facebook for any local reports of the northern lights. our plan was to run outside if anyone reported seeing the pretty colors in the sky so we could get a glimpse of this phenomenon, since it might have been a once in a lifetime event in maryland. this was the plan. we both fell asleep around 9:30 p.M. i woke up around 11p.M. and went to the kitchen to get a drink. i woke amy up and she got on facebook to check for any sightings of the northern lights. i managed to look at the microwave clock because the door to the backyard is in the kitchen and that is when i noticed the time. i walked out the backdoor and in to the backyard while amy was still on the computer. i was looking to the north for a minute or two and noticed nothing unusual. i happened to glance down closer to the horizon and to my right, which would have been east when something caught my eye. it appeared to be something moving slowly from east to west. i couldn't see what it was and the only reason i noticed it was because it blocked out the stars behind it as it moved. it made no sound and i thought it must just be a small cloud or smoke. the sky was perfectly clear, not a cloud in the sky. all of a sudden a perfect triangle of three lights appeared from this invisible craft or cloud and began to spin clockwise. at first i thought is was spotlights but then it began to move in a fast straight line to the west. the lights didn't blink, they were solid white the entire time. the object slowed down, the lights continued to spin and it just disappeared. i was dumbfounded. i love the paranormal and ufo programming on t.V. but am extremely skeptical because i had never seen anything to make me believe it to be true. if what happened next didn't happen i would still be somewhat skeptical. right after the first object disappeared, a second triangle of lights appeared about halfway across the horizon, followed a similar path but this one seemed to appear, disappear, then reappear moving in a straight line to the same spot as the first object. it then seemed to, what i can only describe as disappear behind a veil, but the sky was clear, no clouds. at this point i was shocked and had crazy goose bumps. i began to yell for my girlfriend who i could see sitting in the dinning room on her laptop. i would have yelled for her to come outside to see it but it all happened in about a 10 to 15 second span. she came outside and tried to calm me down but i was 100% sure that i had just seen a real ufo and this scared her. we continued to look for it to reappear and that is when we both saw what appeared to be the shape of a flock of geese followed by two bright greenish white lights. this freaked her out and made me feel like i wasn't crazy. these other lights continued for about another hour on and off and in differing arrays and in different parts of the sky. anywhere from one to four light in a straight row moving at varying speeds. we could see planes in the distance and these were not planes. nothing we saw together was the same or as vivid or close as the triangles that i originally saw though. i don't know what i saw last night but it is unlike anything i have ever seen.
content.summary: Looking for the northern lights when three rotating triangular lights appeared low in the sky moved quickly in a straight line from east to west stopped then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was pulling into my drive way
2. a light
3. a star
4. it looked like a shooting star, except is was white and ascended. 
5. confused
6. took of incredibly fast.
content.summary: Got of car and looked up to see a " shooting star" object take off south west

content.detailedDescription: Went to get my sheep on the 12th and everything was normal. on the 13th i went back to the same area to get the sheep and there were about 10 of these donut shaped circles between 9 and 11ft in diameter the outer circle all vegetation was gone for about 18" then in the inside the vegetation is normal. 4 of the donuts are in a straight line. i have lived here for 19 years and have never seen anything like this, and had 4 friends look at this and they have never seen anything like this.
content.summary: 9 to 11 foot donut shaped circles

content.detailedDescription:
About 4.15 am i went outside to get fresh air,
i looked up to the sky in north direction and saw a very 
bright white flashing light,i found it strange and kept 
looking, and after about 5 seconds it flashed again
very brightly,iam absolutely sure it was not jet or satellite,
the flash of the light was so strong,i saw 2 bright flashes, 
iam not sure if it was single object that moved or if it was 
two objects flashing one time each, and there was absolutely 
no sound.
if it was a single object it had traveled a very long distance
from nort to south in a short time,compared to a jet it traveled 
at least 10 times faster.
content.summary: Bright flashing light in ths sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was letting my dog out to pee around 9:30pm tonight. this is the same scenario for my last ufo sighting several years ago. i'm looking up at the sky, 'wow'ing over how vivid the stars and moon are tonight. i stood up on top of a stone chair in the backyard in order to see the stars more clearly from the tree branches that were in the way. as i stood up i saw a flash of a white shooting star quickly pass upward but then just as quickly descended in a quick right turn and (i assume) disappeared because it went over the top of the roof where i could not see it. i ran to the front yard but it was gone. i don't know if it was a shooting star with a weird trajectory or some other strange but natural phenomenon.

i had just woken up from a nap in which i dreamed of looking at the sky and seeing several ufos and then posted on facebook about my previous ufo sighting several years ago. so that was a bit weird and coincidental. 

after my first ufo sighting i have become a complete believer. i am only interested in what they are...If they are et or our own government. i would love to know the answers to this enigma just like everyone else. ever since my first sighting, i have been absolutely fascinated with the subject. i feel grateful that i have been enlightened and able to witness some of these amazing events happening in our sky.
content.summary: White glowing 'shooting star' that changed direction

content.detailedDescription: My brother inlaw and i were sitting outside on my balcony when suddenly we both saw this ball of light appear out of nowhere and shoot downwards  at a 15 degree angle the ground then suddenly changed and shot upwards for a second then vanished
content.summary: Huge ball of white light

content.detailedDescription: I was travelling south on hwy. 35w, during heavy traffic approximate 6-7pm in the evening.  i suddenly noticed to my right (east) a flat, black trapazoid-like shaped object (pyramid shape with the tip cut off) traveling west.  it had no distinct features on it or lights.  it was a black, matte (no shine) color.  when i first saw it i asked myself if it was a bird, a kite, some sort of glider?  obviously none of those things would be flying over a major highway! i held my hand and up to my windshield to give reference to size of it. comparably, it was about the same size.  a person may have completely missed it if they hadn't looked up from the traffic in front of them, it was traveling in-between the setting sun and darkened sky.  my brain was trying to comprehend what i was seeing, not loose sight of it and make sure i didn't run into the car in front of me.  it slowly crossed all 4 south-bound lanes and 4 north-bound lanes in a straight path.  i looked out my driver's-side window at that point, i saw streams of orange/red light hitting my window. ?  kept telling myself  "you have to remember this!  don't freak out and forget!" i was a bit freaked by the time i arrived home, but totally thought that everyone on that highway saw it; and thus, it would be in the news.  texted all my friends to watch the news for the story.  that did not happen.  i never let go the the experience, but wondered if i was the only one to have witnessed it that night.
content.summary: Black non-metalic trapazoid shaped object flew a straight-line pattern across major highway

content.detailedDescription: I went out on my porch to smoke. i noticed a bright yellow light rising over my nieghbors house heading my direction.I thought it was landing lights but it was not white. as it passed over my house i was listening for sound and looking for beacon lights but there were none. i got off my porch to look back southeast as it passed over and it remained the same bright round yellow fireball looking light it appeared as it was coming towards me. it maintained the same rapid southeast risung course untill it vanished . i know it was rising bacause i did not have to go to the back yard to see it fly out of sight. it seemed quite low and close when i first saw it like it had just taken of from the northwest side of new castle. i have never seen anything like this before. i called the sheriffs department to see if anyone else had reported anything strange. he said people did not usually report these things. he did say that the northern lights were apparently visible on this night wich is extremely rare. this was not the northern lights nor was it a meteor. it was a craft of some kind. just not any craft i have ever seen. if you get any more reports on this sighting here tonight please inform me im baffled and do not want to feel crazy.
content.summary: Round yellow light seemed to rise the whole time it passed over rapidly and without sound appearance never changed as it passed over seemed to climb out of sight round fireball in appearance with no tail

content.detailedDescription: Looking at the skye and noticed multiple red dots in the sky moving in sink to form a rectangle into a triangle, into one single dot and then disappeared. i know it wasnt a plane this is definitely a smart out of the world object. ive seen videos of it before and thought it was bullshit but now im a believer cause i saw it with my own eyes.
content.summary: Red dots moving from triangle to single dot

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I have had a reptilian living with me since octber 2009. esp contact every evening since then....Talks english and asking about my life and staying in it every evening....In siluette form others hear him...And know about him. would you like someone come over and talk to him...I'm a friend of his. he says his name is reptan and i have a potograph of him.He stays in siluette but talks...
content.summary: Contact made

content.detailedDescription: Last night around 8:25 my son noticed the objects when he was leaving his grandmas home.My son came inside the house to tell us there was strange objects in the sky.When we went outside and started noticing the objects we thought it was military crafts.There was a lot of objects ascending from the mountain located south from our home.They were different colors,shapes and forms.The first we notice were ascending in groups of 12 at the same time and disappear.Then the other objects started coming in groups of 3 ascending and when they were really high in the sky they would disappear.There was 3 that form into a triangle and then there was a green light connecting them,it seem like they pulled  each other together in the sky.All of a sudden we start seeing helicopters flying were the objects were flying and the objects stop from coming and started disapearing. we called the police because we thought it was dangerous and the police took along time to get to our house.When the police arrive to our home there was no more objects in the sky.The police told us that we were the only people that called the police regarding that matter.We felt amazed of what we encounter and cant explain what can it be and what they were doing here.Amazing!!!!!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Last night my family and i witness more than 50 ufo`s near our home.

content.detailedDescription: I was visittng my horses down the street in lake elizabeth, ca.  this is semi rural north los angeles county in the angeles national forest.  the sky is very clear.  we are about thirty miles from edwards afb.  i believe the time was 9:30 to 10 at night.  i made a post on my facebook page and the first response was at 11pm.  i was gazing up at the stars.  an object moved across the sky at great speed.  the speed was similar to that of a shooting star.  although i was in a shallow canyon, i did have view of a large portion of the sky.  the object was first noticed about 45 deg from a nominal flat horizon to the west.  the oject moved roughly west to east to around 45 deg from the opoosite horizon until i lost view.  this is a great arc across the visible sky.  the object blocked the light of the stars, like a shadow running across the ground.  above i checked "transparent" i was not sure if i could see the stars behind/through the shadow.  the size is impossible for me to quantify.  if i was standing starring at the night sky and i had my arm reaching up to the stars, my thumb or a thumb and a half could have been the width of the object that blocked the star light.  the moment this happened i felt an overwhelming awe rush through me.  i had nothing in my mental data base that could explain what i had just seen.  i finished up my chores and went up to the house.  the horses were kept at my wifes sister, shelly, house.  i was still all worked up from the sighting.  i told the story to my wife, deb, to shelly and a few others.  shelly was on her last day or two of life from a battle with melanoma.  shelly saids "it's me".  she had a good sense of humor but the comment left us all kind of speechless for a moment.  i now work evenings and get to listen to george nory on the way home.  it was through his show that i heard of mufon and was encouraged to report my sighting.
content.summary: Large object moved across sky with speed of a shooting star, blocked light from stars.

content.detailedDescription:
Left my house to go to the grocery before a midnite closing time. i was 1/4 mile from home in a large urban neighbor hood 1/4 mile from a main thorough fare (state st 3700 block  i was on taft 1 block from 36th st.) saw a red light in the se over houses and trees on south side of road.
 bright red with orange rays extending in front of its path. the rays were numerous and appeared like lens distortion with the naked eye. i examined it expecting it to be a plane but no other lights were visible. there was a very low cloud ceiling that was lit up from the streetlights of boise. the object was clearly lower than the clouds. i then wondered about the chinese lantern possibility but it was very bright. i pulled over the the side of taft and jumped out and realized it was moving toward me. it approached at about the speed of a small plane but completely silent. just then a man stepped out into the street and began moving his garbage can. i said, "hey look up!" he responded by asking what it was just as it passed over head. almost directly overhead but slightly east of us. i said that it was a ufo and he said he was glad i was there to confirm that we both saw it. i removed my cellphone and took a photo and started filming as it passed over the houses to the ne. as it began to gain some distance i attempted to make a call to someone at my house. my siri function answered that "i'm sorry but that isn't possible at this time" (cell service failure? i don't know) i tried again and call went thru but object was out of sight. photo is shakey and video does show object for 20 seconds as it gained distance.
content.summary: Low flying bright red starlike light flying under clouds se-nw silent  emitting orange rays

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i stepped out side to enjoy the weather. as i looked off my front porch i noticed a object moving over the tree line, from south to the north. the object looked like a v then as it moved through the sky it changed shapes . the thing glowed like silver and then would look transparent. this went on for about 25 seconds. then it simply vanished into thin air. the whole time we watched it, it never made a sound what so ever. this thing was huge and as it moved it would change sizes.
content.shape: Circle,   Oval,   Sphere,   Triangle,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: My brother and i seen an object moving w/o sound and changing shapes.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 9:00pm 04-12-2013. i was outside with my dog. it was dark so i had a 1600 lumen, led, 5 mode flashlight. i shined it up into the high trees to look at the tops of the trees more than 100 feet above here in the wooded area where we live. i had the flashlight on highest/brightest mode. to my surprise i saw rod like objects about 1/8 inch long & about the thickness of less than a human hair. these tiny objects were reflective & somewhat transparent in appearance & showed up in the beam of my led flashlight on it's highest setting only. on the lower settings & with a regular flashlight i could not see the objects but it appeared to look like a microscopic snow storm of sorts with these objects gently falling in the still air at about the speed of 1/3 the speed of a snowflake.  these objects or whatever they were, were mixed in with the dust & i suspect tree pollen since the other objects were round or irregular.  there were hundreds if not thousands of these objects in the beam of my light. i walked around our property & saw this at every location i shined the light upward. our trees are pollenating here in the woods at this time of the year so at first i thought "tree pollen" since we can see the yellow pollen on objects like a picnic bench. i looked up pine tree pollen magnified on the internet & this was not what i saw. the pollen looked round & irregular. i then thought since we live in an area where there is gold in the ground & asbestos rock in the area i thought perhaps asbestos particles. i looked up asbestos magnified on the internet & noted many tiny strands that looked like what i saw but perhaps "broken up pieces." we had our doors open that day so i looked into the light beam in our house & saw these "rod shaped things" mixed in with the dust particles but these things reflected light & were all of the same shape. my wife saw the same "particles" in the light beam outside & confirmed what i saw. the strange thing was that all of these particles were somewhat transparent & reflective & about the same size. i went outside tonight 04-13-2013 & shined my led 1600 lumen flashlight into the sky & did not see these particles or objects again. for the past week my wife & myself have had headaches & have felt very tired. i am finally starting to feel better but today my wife complained of tiredness. perhaps this is the pollen. we do not know. over 5 years ago our dog at the time died of lung cancer & had been coughing a lot. i don't know that what i saw has any bearing to anything except of this earth but i thought it worth reporting.
content.summary: 1/8 inch long, less than human hair diameter, reflective objects.

content.detailedDescription: I was getting out of a car to go into my house when i looked up and saw three objects in the sky glowing orange and appearing to travel in the same direction.  the objects appeared to be triangular in shape.  i took a video of this as well as a picture with my iphone.
content.summary: 3 orange objects flying in formation - not aircraft. no flashing beacon or lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my car and noticed  a jet with a chem trail and then i seen a white dot cross paths but this object had no chem  trail as it  went the opposite direction at the same speed and faded away after less than a minute. i dont think it was a bird because it was too high and fast. i seen the same thing about a month  ago in lewisville but the object was following a jet real close for a couple minutes.
content.summary: It passed a jet but this object had no chem trail and faded away.

content.detailedDescription: Driving down sh 4 getting ready to get on kilpatrick turnpike spur in ok between blanchard and tuttle. i was looking up at the signs making sure i was in the correct lane and saw a silver disc hovering toward my right. i looked back and forth at it 5-6 times, trying to figure out if it was a reflection or a highway lamp, etc. the last time i looked it was just gone. it was flat, silver, no lights. this was about 1 pm - nice day, i think it was sunny.
content.summary: Hovering silver disc in ok

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were on our way home from the gas station around 11:50pm - 12:10am between friday night/saturday morning on april 4th/5th 2013. we were in the car and almost home, we were driving down a street that turns into cul-de-sac. we preceded for about 150 feet when we both felt like we needed to look up at the sky in front of us. we looked up at the sky and saw a ufo that seemed to be hovering between 1500 and 2500 feet over the thorton quarry on i-80 about 30 minutes south of chicago. it appeared for about 5 seconds and seemed to be descending very slowly. it barely descended and then disappeared. it did not fade out, just disappeared. it was like somebody turning off a flashlight. we stopped and kept watching the sky for about 5 minutes but we didn't see anything else, not even a trail. we were totally shocked and tried to figure out what else it could be. it was too low in the sky to be an airplane and there is no way it was a helicopter. it was absolutely silent and hovering perfectly steady. the quarry that it was hovering over is actually one of the largest quarries in the world.
content.summary: Witnessed green orb hovering over quarry on i-80 near chicago.

content.detailedDescription: More from above wyoming valley. in n.E.Pa. for anyone whose intersested take pics on partly cloudy days. and youll see little flashes like diamonds,once you see the flash start taking pics.You will not see until reveiw. sometimes they are white, or dark round objects but they are always there. maybe drones from bigger crafts or they come from space,underground. or maybe they are alive themselves. im not trying to tell anyone what they are,but i know that they are not something i could see with out the help of a camera. if someone with a high speed camera did this just for a couple days they would(maybe) get something.Thanx happy hunting!
content.summary: Reviewing shots of western sky at dusk, sunset. didnt see until review of filled memory card.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back porch watching the doves in the trees i saw a small object coming from from the left about 2 or 300 ft. off the ground across the trees in front of me above my house. it then looked like a bird to me at first then it looked like balloons and then it got closer, i could see what it was, it looked gun black, about 10 ft round and 6 to 8 ft tall. it looked like a thread bobbing, it flew across the sky, the same speed and until it went out of my sight. it took about 30 seconds to go from left to right, absolutely no noise, it blew my mind. i could not believe i saw that in the sky. i live 2 miles from faa center in new jersey. i have seen every plane that the air force has flown over my house, it was not a plane.
content.summary: Flew across  the sky right in front me 200 or 300 feet up.
